metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4470 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Off-by-one error in the inflate function in mszipd.c in libmspack before 0.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted CAB archive. It was discovered that cabextract incorrectly handled certain malformed CAB files. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause cabextract to crash, resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: cabextract: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libmspack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
